member.name: ID3D11RefDefaultTrackingOptions.SetTrackingOptions
member.summary: Sets graphics processing unit (GPU) debug reference default tracking options for specific resource types.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the type of resource to track.

A combination of -typed flags that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies tracking options. If a flag is present, the tracking option that the flag represents is set to "on"; otherwise the tracking option is set to "off."
member.returns: This method returns one of the Direct3D 11 return codes.

member.name: ID3D11RefDefaultTrackingOptions
member.summary: The default tracking interface sets reference default tracking options.
